body_html:
Trying to install tensorflow-gpu 1.2 from source on Ubuntu-16.04.
bazel version: 0.5.3
Cuda compilation tools, release 8.0, V8.0.61
CUDNN_MAJOR 5 CUDNN_MINOR 1 CUDNN_PATCHLEVEL 5
gcc version: 4.9.3
Same error as @sounakdey .
Note: I have made one change to third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl as mentioned in #11871 .
Any solutions?
body_text:
Trying to install tensorflow-gpu 1.2 from source on Ubuntu-16.04.
bazel version: 0.5.3

CUDNN_MAJOR  5  CUDNN_MINOR  1  CUDNN_PATCHLEVEL  5
gcc version: 4.9.3
Same error as  @sounakdey .
Note: I have made one change to third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl as mentioned in #11871 .
Any solutions?
body:
Trying to install tensorflow-gpu 1.2 from source on Ubuntu-16.04.
bazel version: 0.5.3
Cuda compilation tools, release 8.0, V8.0.61
CUDNN_MAJOR  5  CUDNN_MINOR  1  CUDNN_PATCHLEVEL  5
gcc version: 4.9.3
Same error as  @sounakdey .
__Note:__ I have made one change to __third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl__ as mentioned in #11871 .
Any solutions?
